privacy_policy_validation.overview: Comprehensive validation of TailTracker's privacy policy implementation against app store requirements and legal compliance standards
compliance_frameworks: PIPEDA (Personal Information Protection and Electronic Documents Act)

details: Privacy policy URL properly implemented: https://tailtracker.app/privacy
All collected data types clearly disclosed
evidence: URL included in App Store Connect metadata
Policy covers all iOS-specific data collection

details: Clear statement: 'TailTracker does not sell, rent, or trade your personal information'
Limited third-party sharing documented with purposes
Service providers listed with their privacy policies
All data collection types declared in policy match Play Console form

background_location.justification: Background location monitoring for pet safety clearly explained with user benefit
background_location.user_education: Multiple explanations of why background location is essential for pet safety

location_access.justification: Core functionality clearly requires location access
location_access.user_benefit: Pet safety and recovery features explicitly described

user_rights_implementation: ‚úÖ Right to be informed - Privacy policy provides comprehensive information
‚úÖ Right of access - Users can view all collected data in app settings
‚úÖ Right to rectification - Users can edit/correct their information
‚úÖ Right to erasure - Account deletion removes all data within 30 days
‚úÖ Right to restrict processing - Users can disable location tracking
‚úÖ Right to data portability - Export functionality available
‚úÖ Right to object - Users can opt-out of non-essential processing
‚úÖ Rights related to automated decision making - No automated decisions affecting users
data_protection_measures: ‚úÖ Data minimization - Only necessary data collected
‚úÖ Purpose limitation - Data used only for stated purposes
‚úÖ Storage limitation - Retention periods clearly defined
‚úÖ Security measures - Encryption and access controls described
‚úÖ Accountability - Privacy by design principles implemented

consumer_rights: ‚úÖ Right to know - Privacy policy details all collection and use
‚úÖ Right to delete - Account deletion process clearly described
‚úÖ Right to opt-out of sale - Clear statement that data is not sold
‚úÖ Right to non-discrimination - No penalties for exercising rights
business_obligations: ‚úÖ Data collection disclosure at point of collection
